text: Yeh tha (taamir e kaaba ka maqsad) aur jo koi Allah ki qayam karda hurmaton (sanctity) ka ehtamam karey to yeh uske Rubb ke nazdeek khud usi keliye behtar hai. Aur tumhare liye maweshi (cattle) jaanwar halal kiye gaye , ma siwa un cheezon ke jo tumhein batayi jaa chuki hain. Pas buthon(Idols) ki gandagi se bacho, jhooti baaton se parheiz karo
